verses.verse: "Now this <S%H2088><s%> is the commandment, <S%H4687><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> [me] to teach <S%H3925><s%> you, that you might do <S%H6213><s%> [them] in the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are going <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it,

so <S%H4616><s%> that you and your son <S%H1121><s%> and your grandson <S%H1121><s%> might fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His statutes <S%H2708><s%> and His commandments, <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you, all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life, <S%H9132><s%> and that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged. <S%H748><s%>

"O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you should listen <S%H8085><s%> and be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> [it], that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with you and that you may multiply <S%H7235><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, has promised <S%H1><s%> you, [in] a land <S%H1696><s%> flowing <S%H776><s%> with milk <S%H2100><s%> and honey. <S%H2461><s%>
"Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel! <S%H3478><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is our God, <S%H430><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is one! <S%H259><s%>

"And you shall love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your might. <S%H3966><s%>
"And these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> shall be on your heart; <S%H3824><s%>

and you shall teach <S%H8150><s%> them diligently <S%H8150><s%> to your sons <S%H1121><s%> and shall talk <S%H1696><s%> of them when you sit <S%H3427><s%> in your house <S%H1004><s%> and when you walk <S%H1980><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> and when you lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> and when you rise <S%H6965><s%> up.
"And you shall bind <S%H7194><s%> them as a sign <S%H226><s%> on your hand <S%H3027><s%> and they shall be as frontals <S%H2903><s%> on your forehead. <S%H996><s%> <S%H5869><s%>
"And you shall write <S%H3789><s%> them on the doorposts <S%H4201><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%> and on your gates. <S%H8179><s%>

"Then it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, Abraham, <S%H1><s%> Isaac <S%H85><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3327><s%> to give <S%H3290><s%> you, great <S%H5414><s%> and splendid <S%H1419><s%> cities <S%H2896><s%> which <S%H5892><s%> you did not build, <S%H834><s%>

and houses <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2898><s%> things <S%H2898><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you did not fill, <S%H4390><s%> and hewn <S%H2672><s%> cisterns <S%H953><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you did not dig, <S%H2672><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and olive <S%H2132><s%> trees <S%H2132><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you did not plant, <S%H5193><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied, <S%H7646><s%>

then watch <S%H8104><s%> yourself, lest <S%H6435><s%> you forget <S%H7911><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery. <S%H5650><s%>
"You shall fear <S%H3372><s%> [only] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> and you shall worship <S%H5647><s%> Him, and swear <S%H7650><s%> by His name. <S%H8034><s%>

"You shall not follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> any <S%H312><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> you,

for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> otherwise <S%H6435><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you, and He will wipe <S%H8045><s%> you off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
"You shall not put <S%H5254><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> to the test, <S%H5254><s%> as you tested <S%H5254><s%> [Him] at Massah. <S%H4532><s%>

"You should diligently <S%H8104><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and His testimonies <S%H9381><s%> and His statutes <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

"And you shall do <S%H6213><s%> what is right <S%H3477><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> with you and that you may go <S%H935><s%> in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to [give] your fathers,
by driving <S%H1920><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> asks <S%H7592><s%> you in time <S%H4279><s%> to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'What <S%H4100><s%> [do] the testimonies <S%H9381><s%> and the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> [mean] which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you?'

then you shall say <S%H559><s%> to your son, <S%H1121><s%> 'We were slaves <S%H5650><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us from Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

'Moreover, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H5414><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and distressing <S%H7451><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> before our eyes <S%H5869><s%> against Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his household; <S%H1004><s%>

and He brought <S%H3318><s%> us out from there <S%H8033><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> us in, to give <S%H5414><s%> us the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers.'

"So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us to observe <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes, <S%H2706><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> for our good <S%H9185><s%> always <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> and for our survival, <S%H2421><s%> as [it is] today. <S%H3117><s%>

"And it will be righteousness <S%H6666><s%> for us if <S%H3588><s%> we are careful <S%H8104><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as He commanded <S%H6680><s%> us.
